name: HTML5 for Beginner
about: HTML5 is a markup language used for structuring and presenting content on the World Wide Web. It is the fifth and final major HTML version that is a World Wide Web Consortium recommendation.

name: HTML5 Pro
about: HTML5 is a markup language used for structuring and presenting content on the World Wide Web. It is the fifth and final major HTML version that is a World Wide Web Consortium recommendation.

name: C++ for Beginners
about: C++ is a high-level general-purpose programming language created by Danish computer scientist Bjarne Stroustrup as an extension of the C programming language, or C with Classes.

name: C++ Pro
about: C++ is a high-level general-purpose programming language created by Danish computer scientist Bjarne Stroustrup as an extension of the C programming language, or C with Classes.

name: Python for Beginners
about: Python is a high-level, general-purpose programming language. Its design philosophy emphasizes code readability with the use of significant indentation. Python is dynamically-typed and garbage-collected.

name: Python Pro
about: Python is a high-level, general-purpose programming language. Its design philosophy emphasizes code readability with the use of significant indentation. Python is dynamically-typed and garbage-collected.

name: Graphic Design for Beginners
about: Graphic design is a profession, applied art and academic discipline whose activity consists in projecting visual communications intended to transmit specific messages to social groups, with specific objectives.

name: Graphic Design Pro
about: Graphic design is a profession, applied art and academic discipline whose activity consists in projecting visual communications intended to transmit specific messages to social groups, with specific objectives.

name: Motion Graphics for Beginners
about: Motion graphics are a way to communicate with the viewer, and add depth to the story. Together with music and effective copy, they can give us a message.

name: Motion Graphics Pro
about: Motion graphics are a way to communicate with the viewer, and add depth to the story. Together with music and effective copy, they can give us a message.

name: Java for Beginners
about: Java is a high-level, class-based, object-oriented programming language that is designed to have as few implementation dependencies as possible.

name: Java Pro
about: Java is a high-level, class-based, object-oriented programming language that is designed to have as few implementation dependencies as possible.
